markdown:
**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 137 2.0 **Usage** held in 2 hands **Bulk** L --- This ivory flute is adorned with many carvings of eyes. Each has jade pupils and a semiprecious stone as its iris. The eyes flutter open and closed when the flute is played, as if it held the eyes of many independent beings. While playing the flute, you gain a +1 item bonus to Perception checks and [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) checks. **Activate** Cast a Spell; **Effect** You expend a number of charges from this instrument to cast a spell from its list. **Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells. Seer's Flute **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 137 2.0 **Price** 90 gp **Bulk** L ---
  • **Cantrip** [_guidance_](/Spells.aspx?ID=142), [_read aura_](/Spells.aspx?ID=246)
  • **1st** [_object reading_](/Spells.aspx?ID=2012)
Seer's Flute (Greater) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 137 2.0 **Price** 460 gp **Bulk** L ---
  • **2nd** [_augury_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1445), _object reading_, [_see the unseen_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1663)
  • **3rd** [_clairaudience_](/Spells.aspx?ID=39), [_hypercognition_](/Spells.aspx?ID=156), [_wanderer's guide_](/Spells.aspx?ID=368)
Seer's Flute (Major) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 137 2.0 **Price** 1,900 gp **Bulk** L --- The item bonuses are +2.
  • **4th** _clairvoyance_, [_object reading_](/Spells.aspx?ID=2012), [_read omens_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1647)
  • **5th** [_inevitable disaster_](/Spells.aspx?ID=930), [_scouting eye_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1661), [_truespeech_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1728)
name: Seer's Flute (Major)
